articles.content: Since his retirement last year, Harbhajan Singh has been quite vocal about his 23-year-long illustrious journey with the Indian team, which faced its fair share of ups and downs. The 41-year-old won … [+2882 chars]

articles.description: Australia Women retained the Ashes with a 27-run win over England in the opening ODI in Canberra
articles.content: Australia Women retained the Ashes with a 27-run win over England in the opening ODI in Canberra with Beth Mooney (73) and Darcie Brown (4 for 34) playing key roles on the day. England were set 205 t… [+2230 chars]
